TopicTitle: Is there a black stock aero part texture replacer?

Articles.Content: Exactly what the title says; Is there any mod which provides a black version of the stock spaceplane parts, or am I doomed to be stuck with white?
All black ? you can edit the texture if thats what you want ?

8 minutes ago, MeCripp said:

All black ? you can edit the texture if thats what you want ?

Not all black but a pack of ones where it has been well designed and actually looks good black, not just being a plain black everywhere; I dont really have the artistic abilities to edit them beyond just a plain black that looks ugly (And beleive me i've tried), or some weird stretchedness or something I didn't expect and couldn't fix ,and was more of just looking for if there were textures someone had made

Edited January 30, 2016 by nosirrbro
Like maybe a heat shield black look ? I'm no texture person but might take a look at it

KerbPaint mod? I never used it myself, but despite it's version number, I keep seeing it used in 1.0.5. Guess it will let you experiement until you find the exact color you need.

Edited January 30, 2016 by Evanitis

I just found this one, but haven't tried it myself yet. It says it increases heat resistance on the parts too, but if you don't want that you could edit the cfgs. Had a quick look at some of the textures in it tho, and they do look black: https://kerbalstuff.com/mod/756/Heat-Resistant%20Spaceplane%20Parts%20%28HRP%29
